summary: ON JULY 20, TOOK MY 2014 5TH WHEELER RV IN FOR TIRE INSPECTION PRIOR TO TRIP, AT THIS TIME I REPLACED 1 OF OF THE TIRES, EVEN THOUGH IT PASSED THE INSPECTION I WAS CONCERNED BECAUSE THAT TIRE SEEMED TO REACH A HIGHER TEMPERATURE TRAVELING. EXACTLY A WEEK LATER WHILE TRAVEL WITH THE PROPER TIRE PRESSURE AT 65MPH. ANOTHER TIRE BLEW OUT CAUSING SERIOUS DAMAGE TO MY RV.  THIS RV WAS PURCHASED NEW IN 2015, TO THIS DAY I HAVE REPLACED 3 TIRES DUE TO DEFECT, THIS WAS THE LAST OF THE ORIGINAL TIRES BESIDE THE SPARE. THESE TIRES ARE DANGEROUS NOT ONLY THO THE DRIVER OF THE UNIT, BUT OTHER TRAVELERS ON THE ROAD. THERE WAS LESS THEN 1000 MILES ON THEM! I AM JUST ONE OF AN ABUNDANCE OF PEOPLE THAT HAVE ALL EXPERIENCED SIMILIAR EXPEREINCES WITH TOWMAX STR 235/80R/16 LOAD E TIRES!
